document_data.mainbody:
Tymoras Melody was a bardic song, imbued with blessings of the Lady Luck.
When performed by a bard, gifted with the use of the Art, the song magically gave the singers allies luck. The luck improved their chances of resisting malevolent spells, avoiding danger, and significantly improved rogueish skills.
By the , Tymoras Melody was performed by some skilled bards. It was heard being performed in the Ten-Towns of Icewind Dale and the village of Kuldahar.
